title: Wizard Voice Pack Of 139 Efforts and Phrases
description: 139 Wizard Efforts and Phrases For Any Game in HQ Mono .wav 44.1khz Studio Quality .wav that are unique phrases and efforts of a Wizard for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games, Mobile Games!
longDescription:
LISTEN TO PACK HERE | LIST OF PHRASES


This pack includes 139 High Quality Wizard Voice Over Efforts & Phrases, recorded and mastered on Studio Equipment by a professional voice actor and covers everything you need for your next project.


The voice suites any Wizard or Magical Old Man character you might need such as:

  • Wizard Character
  • Mage Character
  • Old Character
  • Warlock Character
  • Any Old Man Voice NPC character.


This pack is great for genres such as:

  • FPS
  • MOBA
  • RPG
  • Action Adventure
  • Survival
  • Horror
  • Shooter
  • RTS
  • Sandbox games
  • Side Scrollers
  • Retro Games
  • Animation
  • Videos
  • And the list goes on!


All efforts and phrases included in this pack are unique and completely royalty-free that have been mixed and mastered to studio level quality.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 139 HQ Mono .wav files of good selection of common efforts and phrases for any game
  • Professional Male Voice Actor
  • This pack is divided into the effort/phrases type folders to locate the files easily
  • Top of the line studio quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality .WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.



TECHNICAL DETAILS:

  • Number of Audio tracks: 139
  • Number of Audio Cues: 139
  • Sample rate: 44.1knz 24bit 1058 kbps MONO
  • Does audio loop: YES
  • Minutes of audio provided: 3:30 min
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Supported Target Build Platforms: All


Music in preview is NOT included in this pack. It’s used for watermark purposes only.

Website for more voices or phrases: https://www.christopherromance.com/
